articles.title: Wall Street Ends Week on a High Note - July 25, 2025
articles.description: The S&P 500 and Nasdaq Composite reached record highs, driven by strong corporate earnings and optimism surrounding trade agreements and Federal Reserve policy flexibility.

articles.title: The 7 things you need to know for Friday, July 25
articles.description: Key updates include the U.S. and Israel withdrawing from Gaza ceasefire talks, the IRS considering eliminating non-English language tax services, and a Justice Department official meeting with Ghislaine Maxwell.

articles.title: Global News Morning headlines: Friday, July 25, 2025
articles.description: Top stories include the U.S. and Israel pulling out of Gaza ceasefire talks, the IRS considering ending non-English language tax services, and a Justice Department official meeting with Ghislaine Maxwell.
